full_title: Red Rose Speedway by Paul McCartney & Wings

songs.full_title: Big Barn Bed by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Big Barn Bed
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Who's that coming round that corner?
Who's that coming round that bend?
Who's that coming round that corner?
Will they, will they be my friend? (my friend)

[Chorus]
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed

[Verse 2]
Who you going to weep on, who you going to sleep on
Who you going to creep on next?
Weeping on a willow, sleeping on a pillow
Leaping armadillo, yes

[Chorus]
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed

[Guitar solo]
Will they, will they be my friend?

[Chorus]
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed

[Verse 2]
Who you going to weep on, who you going to sleep on
Who you going to creep on next?
Leaping armadillo, weeping on a willow
Sleeping on a pillow, yes

[Chorus]
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed
Keep on sleeping in a big barn bed

[Outro]
Keep on, woman

songs.full_title: My Love by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: My Love
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
And when I go away
I know my heart can stay with my love
It's understood, it's in the hands of my love
And my love does it good

[Chorus]
Wo, wo-wo, wo
Wo, wo-wo, wo
My love does it good

[Verse 2]
And when the cupboard's bare
I'll still find something there with my love
It's understood, it's everywhere with my love
And my love does it good

[Chorus]
Wo, wo-wo, wo
Wo, wo-wo, wo
My love does it good

[Bridge]
Oh, I love, oh, my love
Only my love holds the other key to me
Oh, my love, oh, my love
Only my love does it good to me

[Guitar solo: Henry McCullough]

[Chorus]
Wo, wo-wo, wo
Wo, wo-wo, wo
My love does it good

[Verse 3]
Don't ever ask me why
I never say goodbye to my love
It's understood, it's everywhere with my love
And my love, she does it good

[Chorus]
Wo, wo-wo, wo
Wo, wo-wo, wo
Wo, wo-wo, wo
Wo, wo-wo, wo
My love does it good

[Outro]
Oh oh, I love, oh oh, my love
Only my love does it good to me
Wo, wo, wo, wo
Wo oh, wo oh, wo

songs.full_title: Get on the Right Thing by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Get on the Right Thing
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
All at once, you get love on your mind
And your world is as kind as a penny
Oh....

[Chorus 1]
Well, you knew it all along
You did the right thing
Believe me it's true
And it can happen to you

[Verse 2]
All at once, you get sound in your ears
And your cloud disappears into yellow

[Chorus 2]
Well, you know they were wrong
Get on the right thing
Yeah, you knew it all along
Get on the right thing
Believe me it's so
Because I happen to know

[Chorus 3]
Try a little love, you can't go wrong
Get on the right thing
Get on the right thing
Get on the right thing
My little love, you can't go wrong
Get on the right thing
Get on the right thing
Get on the right thing
Do, get on the right thing, you

[Guitar solo]

[Verse 3]
All at once, we see things in our skies
And we both realize it together

[Chorus 4]
Well, you know they were wrong
Get on the right thing
Yes, you knew it all along
Get on the right thing
Believe me it's so (it's so babe)
Because I happen to know

[Chorus 5]
You can't go wrong
Get on the right thing
Get on the right thing
Get on the right thing
You can't go wrong get on the right thing
Ah get on the right thing you
And try a little love
And it can't go wrong
Get on the right thing you
Try a little love, you can't go wrong
Get on the right thing
Oh, get on the right thing you

[Instrumental]

[Outro]
Try a little love, you can't go wrong
Get on the right thing
Get on the right thing
Get on the right thing
Try a little love, you can't go wrong
Get on the right thing
Get on the right thing
Get on the right thing
Get on the right thing
Get on the right thing
Get on the right thing
Get on the right thing

songs.full_title: One More Kiss by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: One More Kiss
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Only one more kiss
I didn't mean to hurt you, little girl
Let's make it one to remember
Only one more kiss

[Verse 1]
I said a foolish thing last night
I didn't think you'd take it bad
But now i'm on my way again
And just before I go

[Chorus]
Only one more kiss
I never mean to hurt you, little girl
Let's make it one to remember
Only one more kiss

[Guitar Solo]

[Chorus]
Only one more kiss
I didn't mean to hurt you, little girl
Let's make it one to remember
Only one more kiss

[Verse 2]
Somebody's built a home for us
Someday we'll see it standing there
But like the wind that has to blow
I must be on my way

[Chorus]
Only one more kiss
I never mean to hurt you little girl
Let's make it one to remember
Only one more kiss

[Outro]
Well, only one more kiss
Hey, hey, hey

songs.full_title: Little Lamb Dragonfly by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Little Lamb Dragonfly
songs.lyrics:
[Section 1: Little Lamb]
[Verse 1]
I have no answer for you, little lamb
I can help you out, but I cannot help you in
Sometimes you think that life is hard
And this is only one of them
My heart is breaking for you, little lamb
I can help you out, but we may never meet again

[Chorus]
La la la la la la la
La la la la la la la
La la la la la la la
La la la la la la la

[Section 2: Dragonfly]
[Verse 2]
Dragonfly, fly by my window
You and I still have a way to go
Don't know why you hang around my door
I don't live here any more
Since you've gone, I never know (Since you've gone)
I go on, but I miss you so (I go on)

[Verse 3]
Dragonfly, don't keep me waiting
(I'm waiting, can't you see me, I'm waiting)
When we try, we'll have a way to go
Dragonfly, you've been away too long
How did two rights make a wrong?
Since you've gone I never know (Since you've gone, I never know)
I go on, but I miss you so (I go on... I miss you so)
In my heart, the feel the pain (In my heart, feel of pain)
Keeps coming back again

[Verse 4]
Dragonfly, fly by my window
(I'm flying, can't you see me, I'm flying)
You and I can find a way to see (You and I... see)
Dragonfly, the years ahead will show
How little we really know
Since you've gone, it's never right
They go on, the lonely nights
Come on home and make it right

[Section 3: Little Lamb]
[Refrain]
My heart is aching for you little lamb
I can help you out, but I cannot help you in

[Outro]
La la la la la la la
La la la la la la la
La la la la la la la
La la la la la la la
La la la la la la la
La la la la la la la
La la la la la la la
La la la la la la la

songs.full_title: Single Pigeon by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Single Pigeon
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Single pigeon through the railings
Did she throw you out?
Sunday morning fight about Saturday night

[Verse 2]
Single seagull gliding over Regent's Park Canal
Do you need a pal for a minute or two?
You do?

[Chorus]
Me too, me too, me too
I'm a lot like you
Me too, me too, me too
I'm a lot like you

[Verse 3]
Did she turf you out in the cold morning rain
Again?

[Chorus]
Me too, me too, me too
I'm a lot like you
Me too, me too, me too
I'm a lot like you

[Outro]
Sunday morning fight about Saturday night

songs.full_title: When The Night by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: When The Night
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Well the night (Well the night)
Was beautiful and mellow (Mellow, mellow)
And the light (And the light)
Of the night (Of the night)
Fell on me (Fell on me)

[Verse 2]
You said right (You said right)
Made me a happy fellow (Fellow, fellow)
And the light (And the light)
Of the night (Of the night)
Fell on me (Fell on me)

[Bridge 1]
I never will forget the night
I held you close, I held you tight
Oh darling, don't you know?
The way you made my senses reel
I fell in love, and now I feel
Like I will never go
Oh little darling, don't you know?

[Verse 3]
That the night (That the night)
Was marvelous and yellow (Yellow, yellow)
And the light (And the light)
Of the night (Of the night)
Fell on me (Fell on me)

[Verse 4]
And the light of the night
Fell on me

[Bridge 2]
I never will forget the way
You taught me how to swing and sway
Oh darling, don't you know?
That ever since that special day
My mind can only contemplate
The magic that you show
Oh little darling, don't you know?

[Verse 5]
That the night (That the night)
Is beautiful and yellow (Yellow, yellow)
And the light (And the light)
Of the night (Of the night)
Fell on me (Fell on me)
Fell on me (Fell on me)

[Outro]
Yeah the light (And the light, of the night)
Fell on me (Fell on me)
Yeah, fell on me (Fell on me)
Oh, the light (And the light, of the night)
Fell on me (Fell on me, fell on me)
Yes the light fell on me
(Fell on me)
(Fell on me)
(Fell on me)
(Fell on me)
(Fell on me)
(Fell on me)

songs.full_title: Medley: Hold Me Tight/Lazy Dynamite/Hands of Love/Power Cut by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Medley: Hold Me Tight/Lazy Dynamite/Hands of Love/Power Cut
songs.title_with_featured: Medley: Hold Me Tight/Lazy Dynamite/Hands of Love/Power Cut
songs.lyrics:
Hold Me Tight
[Verse 1]
I've waited all my life for you
Hold me tight
Take care of me and I'll be right

[Chorus]
Hold me tight, hold me tight
Hold me tight, hugga me right
Hold me tight, squeeza me tight
Hold me tight, hugga me right
Hold me tight, hold me tight
Hold me tight

[Verse 2]
You won't be going out tonight
Candlelight
Make love to me and make it right

[Chorus]
Hold me tight, hold me tight
Hold me tight, hugga me right
Hold me tight, hold me tight
Hug me right, hold me tight
Hold me tight, hold me tight

[Instrumental Verse]

[Chorus]
Well hold me tight, hold me tight
Hold me tight, hugga me right
Hold me tight, squeeza me tight
Hold me tight, hugga me right
Hold me tight, hold me tight

Lazy Dynamite
[Chorus]
Oh, lazy dynamite
Oh, lazy dynamite
Oh, lazy dynamite
Oh, lazy dynamite

[Verse 1]
Won't you come out tonight, when the time is right
Oh will you fight that feeling in your heart
Don't you know that inside there's a love you can't hide
So why do you fight that feeling in your heart?

[Chorus]
Oh, lazy dynamite
Oh, lazy dynamite
Oh, lazy dynamite
Oh, lazy dynamite

[Verse 2]
Oh, why do you fight that feeling in your heart
Don't you know that inside, there's a love you can't hide
So why do you fight that feeling in your heart?

[Chorus]
Oh, lazy dynamite
Oh, lazy dynamite
Oh, lazy dynamite
Oh, lazy dynamite

[Outro]
Doo doo doo

Hands of Love
[Verse 1]
I can't get over myself falling into the hands of love
Just can't imagine myself falling head over heels in love
But when I saw you last night I knew for the first time
That you were the one I'd been dreaming of
I can't get over myself falling into the hands of love
Falling into the hands of love

[Verse 2]
But when I saw you last night I knew for the first time
That you were the one I've been dreaming of
I can't get over myself falling into the hands of love
Falling into the hands of love
Love sweet love

[Verse 3]
But when I saw you last night I knew for the first time
That you were the one I'd been dreaming of
I can't get over myself falling into the hands of love
Falling into the hands of love
Love sweet love

Power Cut
[Verse 1]
There may be a power cut
And the candles burn down low
But something inside of me
Says the bad news isn't so

[Chorus]
I may never tell you
But baby, you should know
There may be a miracle (miracle, miracle, miracle)
And baby, I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so
Baby, I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so

[Instrumental Verse]

[Chorus]
I may never tell you
But baby you should know
There may be a miracle (miracle, miracle, miracle)
And baby, I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so
Baby, I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so
Baby, I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so
Baby, I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so

[Outro]
Baby, I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so
Baby, I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so
Be I love you so

songs.full_title: The Mess (Live in The Hague) by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: The Mess (Live in The Hague)
songs.lyrics:
You sailed away one night in June
I heard you say you would be back soon
But since that day it's been one long loon
Oh sweet darling, what a mess I'm in

I spoke to Jimmy with the big tattoo
Said had he seen any sign of you
He looked at me and then laughed at you
See my love, just wait a minute
Oh sweet darling, what a mess I'm in

[Guitar Solo]

When I want ya do I get ya
All I needed your number
Will you give me your number

Oh sweet darling
Oh sweet darling
Oh sweet darling, what a mess I'm in
The mess I'm in, since you left me
The mess I'm in, oh yeah
Oh oh, oh oh wo wo
Oh, oh oh oh oh, wo wo

When you're near me
Can you hear me
I can't see ya
I can feel ya
When you're near me
Can ya hear me

songs.full_title: C Moon by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: C Moon
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Check, mm, check, mm, check it out
Mm-mm
Uh huh, mh-hmm
Was that the intro I should have been in?
Oh bo-bo-bo, yeah, yeah

[Chorus 1]
C moon, C moon, C moon is she
C moon, C moon, C moon to me

[Verse 1]
How come no one older than me
Ever seems to understand
The things I wanna do?
It will be L7
And I'd never get to heaven
If I filled my head with glue
What's it all to you?

[Chorus 1]
C moon, C moon, C moon is she, oh
C moon, C moon, C moon to me

[Verse 2]
Bobby lived with Patty
But they never told her daddy
What their love was all about
She could tell a number
That he thought of
But she never was the type to let it out
What's it all about?

[Chorus 2]
C moon, C moon, oh, C moon are we
I said, C moon, C moon, C moon are we

[Verse 1]
How come no one older than me
Ever seems to understand
The things I wanna do?
It will be L7
And I'll never get to heaven
If I filled my head with glue
What's it all to you?

[Chorus 1]
C moon, C moon, C moon is she
Oh, C moon, C moon, C moon to me

[Verse 2]
Bobby lived with Patty
But they never told her daddy
What their love was all about
She could tell a number
That she thought of
But she never wanted to let it out
What's it all about?

[Chorus 2]
C moon, C moon, C moon are we
C moon, C moon, C moon are we

What's it all about?

C moon, C moon, C moon are we
C moon are we

songs.full_title: Jazz Street by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Jazz Street

songs.full_title: I Lie Around by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: I Lie Around
songs.lyrics:
[Spoken]
C'mon, it's lovely! C'mon!
This the life in the country! (lovely!)
I'm going for a swim
Yeah!
Lovely! Lovely! Lovely!

[Intro]
I lie around all over the place

[Verse 1]
It seems that I have no choice in the matter
Roll along, wheel of fortune
As you roll along, I stick around
Furthermore, in the country, I will lay my burden down

[Chorus]
I lie around
I lie around
I lie around all over the place
All over the place
All over the place
All over the place

[Verse 2]
Too long (too long) have I (have I) been the heart of the matter
All along (along), I was only (only) over tired and overtaken
Furthermore (furthermore), in the country (the country)
I will lay my burden down

[Chorus]
I lie around
I lie around
I lie around all over the place

[Verse 3]
So long, bye bye
It was fun while it mattered
Roll along, wheel of fortune
As you roll along, I stick around
Furthermore, in the country, I will lay my burden down

[Outro]
Yes, I lie around all over the place
All over the place
All over the place
I lie around, around

songs.full_title: African Yeah Yeah by Paul McCartney (Ft. Linda McCartney)
songs.title: African Yeah Yeah
songs.lyrics:
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah-yeah-yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Boh, boh, a-yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Boh, boh, a-yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

[Ad-lib]

[Verse 1]
Good morning, young master
It's 1882
Your mother is hungry
What will you do?
There is bread in the kitchen
Of the big house upstairs
But I warn you, don’t take it
From them

[Chorus]
You'll be tarred, you'll be feathered
You’ll be hung like a hammer
And I warn you, don't do it
Young man

[Verse 2]
Your mother is calling
She wants you by the bed
So get ready, young master
Go shake your sleepy head
Darling son, "I am dying
And I leave it to you
As I'm leaving
Tell me, what did I do?
I am dying
Tell me, what did I do?"

[Bridge]
Boys steals the bread, now
Packs it up and heads for the door
Man sees him coming
Says "boy you won't be running no more"
Boy gets arrested
And the case is tested that day
Judge finds him guilty
And the jailer takes him away

[Verse 3]
Good morning, young master
It's 25 to 9
They'll be coming, to get you
In 20 minutes time

[Chorus]
You'll be drawn, you'll be quartered
You’ll be hung like hammer
And I warn you, get ready
Young man, yeah

[Verse 4]
Say the boy, "I am dying
And I leave it to you
As I’m leaving
Tell me, what did I do?
As I'm dying
Tell me, what did I do?"

songs.full_title: Hi, Hi, Hi by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Hi, Hi, Hi
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Well, when I met you at the station
You were standing with a bootleg in your hand
I drove you back to my little place
For a taste of a multicolored band
We're gonna get high, high, high
The night is young
I'll put you in my pocket, little mama
Gonna rock it, and we've only just begun

[Chorus]
We're gonna get hi, hi, hi
With the music on
We won't say bye, bye, bye, bye, bye, bye, bye, bye
'Til the night has gone
I'm gonna do it to you, gonna do you sweet banana
You've never been done
We're gonna get hi, hi, hi
In the midday sun

Whoah, oh
Whoa, whoa, oh

[Verse 2]
Well, well, take off your face
Recover from the trip you've been on
I want you to lie on the bed
Getting ready for my polygon
I'm gonna do it to you, gonna do you sweet banana
You've never been done
Yes, and like a rabbit, gonna grab it
Going to do it till the night is done

[Chorus]
We're gonna get hi, hi, hi
With the music on
We won't say bye, bye, bye, bye, bye, bye, bye, bye
'Til the night has gone
I'm gonna do it to you, gonna do you sweet banana
You've never been done
We're gonna get hi, hi, hi
We've got to get hi, hi, hi
We've got to get hi, hi, hi
In the midday sun

[Outro]
Ooh, baby
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Oh
Hi, hi, hi
Hi, hi, hi
Hi, hi
In the midday sun

songs.full_title: Thank You Darling by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Thank You Darling
songs.lyrics:
Say darling (darlin)
Well, I wanna thank you
Yes, I want to thank you
Thank you darling

Darling (darling)
I'd love to thank you
I'd like to thank you
Say thank you darling

Darlin, don't ever leave me
Woah, darlin, never decieve me
Well, believe me

Darling, I'd like to thank you
Yes I'd like to thank you
Say thank you darling

Down on my bended knees I go
I love you so, I love you so
Darling, I love you so, and so I say

songs.full_title: Country Dreamer by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Country Dreamer
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I'd like to walk in a field with you
Take my hat and my boots off too
I'd like to lie in a field with you
Would you like to do it too, May?
Would you like to do it too?

[Verse 2]
I'd like to stand in a stream with you
Roll my trousers up and not feel blue
I'd like to wash in a stream with you
Would you like to do it too?

[Bridge]
You and I, country dreamer
When there's nothing else to do
Me oh my, country dreamer
Make a country dream come true

[Verse 3]
I'd like to climb up a hill with you
Stand on top and admire the view
I'd like to roll down a hill with you
Would you like to do it too, May?
Would you like to do it too?

[Bridge]
You and I, country dreamer
When there's nothing else to do
Me oh my, country dreamer
Make a country dream come true

[Verse 4]
I'd like to climb up a hill with you
Take my hat and my boots off too
I'd like to lie in a field with you
Would you like to do it too, May?
Would you like to do it too, May?
Would you like to do it too?
